title: Venus Transit in the 12th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the twelfth house draws Leo ascendants toward introspection, privacy, and subtle pleasures. Attraction shifts from display to depth, favoring compassion, rest, and quiet connections. Expenses may rise for comfort, travel, or healing, so mindful boundaries are essential. This phase supports artistic solitude, charitable acts, and emotional release. When desire is tempered with awareness, inner peace and creative renewal quietly emerge.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Greater need for privacy and retreat

sections.heading: Finance
points: Spending on comfort, travel, or healing

sections.heading: Mental / Inner
points: Need for rest and emotional cleansing

closing: This transit softens desires into wisdom. By honoring rest and clarity, you renew creativity and emotional balance.
